original_text: They hired thirty-two thousand chariots and charioteers, as well as the king of Maakah with his troops, who came and camped near Medeba, while the Ammonites were mustered from their towns and moved out for battle.
korean_text: 곧 병거 삼만 이천 대와 마아가 왕과 그의 군대를 고용하였더니 그들이 와서 메드바 앞에 진 치매 암몬 자손이 그 모든 성읍으로부터 모여 와서 싸우려 한지라

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 삼만 이천 대의 전차를 고용했습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as the king of Maakah with his troops
who came and camped near Medeba
while the Ammonites were mustered from their towns
